website_summaries.verdict: Some may find the blade too dull for chopping, but many users praise its sturdiness and non-slip handle. We recommend it as part of a larger kitchen gadget gift package.
pros: Ruler gradations are etched directly on blade, not printed
Heavy handle feels good in larger hands
cons: Blade not sharp enough for other uses, especially chopping
Handle is thick, limiting cutting height

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I already had a bench scraper--plastic; however, after seeing a YouTube video touting the perfection of pie crusts made with metal pastry choppers, I bought this. It seems all cold mixing things and NOT using ones hands--they are usually warm-- to blend the pastry dough, really make a difference. As a matter of fact it does. I plan to buy another one soon. My Thanksgiving pie crusts were perfection! I highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline C. Bartha

customer_reviews.title: Multiple Uses
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for baking but have ended up using for other purposes. Awesome for scraping cookies or pastries off cookie sheet. I found it very handy when chopping vegetables for scooping or when chopping meat for tacos great for lifting. It's constructed very well and cleans up easy.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Carmona

customer_reviews.title: It's ok.
customer_reviews.text: I use this more as a scraper as mine did not arrive sharp at all. It might be ok for separating dough but I have not tried that yet. The sharpness must vary because some of the reviews say it's quite sharp. Mine didn't have a blade guard either .
customer_reviews.author: RAE65

customer_reviews.title: Tough chopper for tough veggies
customer_reviews.text: Great chopping item esp for difficult veggies like carrots and rutabaga. Since I have tendon issues with my hand this chopper is easier to use then a knife. It has a thick blade which is not overly sharp but scrapes up really nice. Washes beautifully in dishwasher. The handle is very easy to grip esp for the large handed person. I am sorry I never got one sooner. I might have enjoyed cooking more."
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: It's a solid product and sharp edges so one does need to be a little careful using it or clean then up after receiving it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff B.

customer_reviews.title: Strong, heavy scraper
customer_reviews.text: I really like the handles on this scraper. It is a heavier scraper, and I like that, too. No difficult little niches to frustrate me during cleanup. I use a dedicated soft toothbrush and it's very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Manz

customer_reviews.title: Great value and an excellent kitchen must have.
customer_reviews.text: I cook a lot and this is an awesome tool. Sharp enough to cut dough. Great scraper. If you cook, you need this.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased with This Scraper
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this scraper for about a month. It cuts through dough (bread, pizza, and scone) very well. I have not used it to cut vegetables. I have Wustof knives for that purpose and nothing would compare. I love the ruler/measurement that is engraved directly on the blade of the scraper. It comes in handy when having to roll out dough of a certain size. I have been hand washing the scraper and there is no evidence of rust or staining. I would purchase this product again if I had to.
customer_reviews.author: eda

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, great for cleaning my Blackstone griddle. Get yourself a pair of waterproof high temp gloves (BBQ Pit Gloves) if you are dousing the grill with water at high heat, which is the easiest way to clean the griddle top.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Z

customer_reviews.title: My Mom loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my Mom for Christmas, and she loves it. It cuts through dough with ease and the ruler portion of the cutter is super useful. Dividing bread dough has never been easier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like this kitchen tool
customer_reviews.text: I really like this kitchen tool! I have another with a square wooden handle. This one is much more comfortable to use, doesn't get slippery when wet and stays cool when I am using it with the large griddle.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you see is what you get.
customer_reviews.text: Feels great in your hand. Very sturdy. Really good product.
customer_reviews.author: Cheng-mike

customer_reviews.title: Is comfortable to use
customer_reviews.text: Use it a lot. Is comfortable to use. Moves dough around and cuts it very efficiently.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Familetti

customer_reviews.title: Great Product-Fast Shipping!
customer_reviews.text: The heavy duty stainless steel multi-purpose pastry/bench scraper & chopper is fabulous; everyone should have one! This product is well made and durable! I can't wait to use my new kitchen tool over the holidays!! Thank you for getting my order shipped so quickly!!
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I was a little reluctant to buy this because I wanted a “Master Chef” product, but I was pleasantly surprised at the weight and feel of this product. Just as good as Master Chef and cost less! Win win!
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Great multipurpose kitchen tool.

customer_reviews.title: Its good
customer_reviews.text: It what it's supposed to and is nice and thick.

customer_reviews.title: I love this I was able to pick up sliced green ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this I was able to pick up sliced green onions with 1 sweep. Great tool!! I purchased 1 for my daughter and 1 for my son.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for soap makers!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to cut cold process soap. The ruler lines are perfect. To start I hold up the ruler end and use a sharp knife to make small indents at each inch line on either side of the soap loaf then using the indents this tool easily slices through the soap. Nice cheap tool for measuring and slicing soap fairly neatly.
customer_reviews.author: K.M.

customer_reviews.title: Huge Time Saver
customer_reviews.text: Why am I just now finding this? I prepare a weeks worth of chicken every Sunday and normally chop it all with a standard kitchen knife. It used to take me about 20 minutes and now with this "pastry scrapper" I'm done in less than 5 minutes! Huge Time Saver!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product is built nice and is sharp. Very satisfied with this product.

customer_reviews.title: I will recommend this product and will probably purchase more for gifts
customer_reviews.text: Expectation and reality came together. The product is exactly what I expected and (with limited use) I anticipate multi-use will be one hundred percent satisfactory. I will recommend this product and will probably purchase more for gifts. DAB
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Sunsella stainless chopper
customer_reviews.text: I gave you the five star rating because of the reaction that my granddaughter and her new husband gave when they received their gift. They are stocking their new kitchen. They couldn't wait to get home and try it out.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Heavy and solid. The ruler is stamped in the metal. Made to last.

customer_reviews.title: A must have for every cook.
customer_reviews.text: Thismultipurpose tool saves me a lot of work and cleanup. It slices, dices, measures pastry and scrapes away debris without a switch of hands.

customer_reviews.title: Very good scraper. I find the corners to be too ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good scraper. I find the corners to be too sharp, but it's not enough of a problem for me to take a star. I only use it as a bench scraper for bread, so I can't comment on the chopping function.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - Recommended

customer_reviews.text: I have not used this item yet, but it appears to be all that I hoped it would be. It's a sturdy piece and will be very good for precisely cutting dessert bars for serving.

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen tool that I never knew I needed

customer_reviews.title: This thing is perfect, very heavy weight
customer_reviews.text: This thing is perfect, very heavy weight, very well constructed. Smooth edge, will be perfect for all my baking needs.

customer_reviews.text: Great quality, love that the notches are etched in so they won't disappear as it washes away. Handle and metal scraper all feels sturdy and I think it will last for a long time.

customer_reviews.text: Chops, dices, scrapes, love it. Really gets a thin outcome when slicing vegetables. No need for a razor blade Goodfellas style when slicing garlic.

customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, great for scraping. Not a chopper for all foods; the blade is thick so only chops firm foods like celery or bread cubes. I do like it.

customer_reviews.text: THE handle is much heavier than it looks in photo. and it is not real sharp. So husband has stronger hands, and he likes to use it . I have weak numbing hands and I find the scraper is a challenge for me.

customer_reviews.title: It is a very heavy dull chopper, if you have arthritis in your hands ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a very heavy dull chopper, if you have arthritis in your hands it will be very hard to work with it. I tried chopping vegetables and the blade was so dull it would not chop without using a lot of pressure. Sending it back. Kate

customer_reviews.text: This has a blunt edge. I was expecting at a rounded edge. It's also pretty think which makes it great for scraping. However it does tend to leave black marks on my counter top.

customer_reviews.title: Well don Sunsella!
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted one of these for a long time and finally after making 30 meals for 4 in 2 days for $150 made my hands hurt and I decided to buy one. I looked and looked until I found the Sunsella Stainless Steel Pastry Scraper and thought that's the one I want. I LOVE it! Why didn't I get this a long time ago. I use it every day for one reason or another. You'll find it handy for a lot of things.

customer_reviews.title: For the kitchen..
customer_reviews.text: Love this kitchen tool that I have added to my kitchen.

customer_reviews.title: Not a chopper, only a scraper
customer_reviews.text: As a scraper it is fine.... it does NOT chop food.... tried various vegetables and the blade is not sharp enough to cut onions, carrots, celery etc. $ 10 is a lot of money to use to put cut vegetables from a knife into a pot or pan. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Judy S

customer_reviews.title: Not just for pastry.
customer_reviews.text: Love the pastry scraper, don't bake but I use it to cut hard vegetables like butternut squash.

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was sharper.

customer_reviews.title: Handy tool in the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those tools that every kitchen should have, It's quality made and can be used for many other things besides being a pastry scraper. I frequently use mine scraping up chopped vegs from the cutting board. The handle design is very comfortable as well.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie P.

customer_reviews.title: The test of something like this is when you leave it in a pot ...
customer_reviews.text: How can a scraper be 5 stars? The test of something like this is when you leave it in a pot of water for 2 days and it doesn't rust; when you can put it in the dishwasher and it doesn't rust. I'm a careless cook; if it will rust, I'll find a way. So far in 6 months, not a pock mark on it.
customer_reviews.author: Arty

customer_reviews.title: Sunsella Heavy Duty Stainless Steel - Multi-Purpose, Pastry, Pasta Cutter & Bench Cutter
customer_reviews.text: Sunsella - I Purchased 2. - Heavy Duty Stainless Steel - Multi-Purpose, Pastry, Pasta Cutter & Bench Chopper, Scraper With Ruler is AWESOME! - it’s extremely sturdy... - the build quality is great... - it’s sharp too... A Must Have!
customer_reviews.author: Lorenzo

customer_reviews.title: The blade is too short
customer_reviews.text: I tried to like it, but the metal blade is shorter than it appears on line. It is kinda hard to pick up a med to large sized dough. I ended up using my hands. I wanted to return it but it's too much effort and I am not going to get all of my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Clove

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality - Very happy I made this purchase
customer_reviews.text: This product is sturdy and I love the weight. It also has ergonomic indentations for your fingers in the handle that allow you to grasp it more easily. I am super pleased with this scraper and would definitely recommend it for multiple uses in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Marla S.

customer_reviews.title: The quicker picker upper
customer_reviews.text: I got sooo tired of trying to pick up wee pieces of garlic or onion after chopping/mincing. This is great for scooping up any veggie. Of course, also good for dividing pie, cookie, or bread dough without cutting my silicone pastry mat! The inches are etched into the steel so they will not wash off. It's also very heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: THUNDER DRAGON

customer_reviews.title: Use every day!
customer_reviews.text: Don't know what I did before I ordered this scraper/chopper. Just sharp enough for chopping crisp fruits and vegetables and indispensable cleaning up after kneading bread. Lifts hot cookies easily off cookie sheet without ruining their shape. So many uses!
customer_reviews.author: catlington

product_meta.title: Premium Stainless Steel Pastry Scraper & Chopper By Sunsella
product_meta.description:
Take the chore out of kitchen prep with this simple to use kitchen essential! 

 Sturdy heavy duty metal engineered blade edge, makes cutting and chopping a breeze. Super comfortable, hardwearing, non-slip, ergonomic rubber handle for extra control. Ruler is etched on blade with inch increments for precise measuring when pastry making and baking.

 Multi use utensil- Scrape benches, use as a scooper or cutter, flour blender or a handy cookie, cake, biscuit or bread kitchen tool! 

 Some added benefits of Sunsella Pastry Scraper... 
- Blade constructed from high-grade stainless steel that wont tarnish over time. 
- Large blade for transfer of chopped vegetables, or meat straight, to the pot with one scoop. 
- Dishwasher safe for easy clean up. 
- Tough enough for the professional kitchen or any home. 
- Crush and chop with one kitchen tool. 
- Makes scraping and splitting dough a simple task. 
- Perfect addition to your BBQ tool kit, great for flipping and use the heavy-duty blade for scraping down grill when your done. 
- Clean up has never been easier when baking, the durable blade edge will loosen the toughest dough from cutting boards and counter tops. 



 Time saving multi-function kitchen tool that will soon become a must have for your daily cooking and baking.

 All-in one... 
-Chopping 
- Slicing 
- Dicing 
- Crushing 
- Dividing 
- Scooping 
- Measuring 
- Clean up 
- And more...
feature_bullets: PREMIUM QUALITY: ★ High-grade stainless steel ★ Non-slip rubber handle ★ Hard-wearing ★ Ergonomic ★ Dishwasher safe. Sunsella
FEATURES: ★ Stamped measurements ★ Machine edged blade ★ Heavy duty construction ★ Scratch-free corners ★ Durable rubber handle.
MULTI USE: Great for baking prep and pastry making. Use as a BBQ grill tool or chop and slice vegetables and meat then use the large blade to transfer straight to the pot with one scoop.

TOUGH: Made from high-grade stainless steel with a super comfortable non-slip, ergonomic rubber handle. Features a sturdy engineered blade that wont tarnish over time, a machined edge for slicing and dicing with ease and rounded corners that wont dig into your cutting board or bench top. Dishwasher safe for easy clean up.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars390 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
